website_summaries.verdict: Though there are a few concerns, this four-person option is spacious, comfortable, and fun to use.
pros: Roomy as it easily seats up to 4 people
Strong jets are effective at producing bubbles
A great model if you're looking for real hot tub experience in an inflatable model
cons: Setup is simple but takes time

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - Please help!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got package and install the spa... Pretty easy.. Then filled it up with water and turned on the heater overnight. So the next morning I was super excited to go into my new spa, only to find it was totally flat!!!! I found the leak, it was outside the spa linning.. I was super disappointed... I went to use the patches provided to only find that they company didnt provide the glue. This company has quality control issues. So with my brand new spa I need to worry if it's flat with my backyard being flooded everyday.
customer_reviews.author: todd carbone

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect solution for us when our last hot tub quit ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution for us when our last hot tub quit working. There are plenty of jets, the temperature holds we, and it's easy to set up. The only complaint would be I can't see it being comfortable for 4 people. With 2 adults and 1 kid there is barely room for movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy and SOOOO amazing. Go salt water for easy maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: One and done
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up, got it filled with water and it took 24 hours to come up to temperature. We were able to enjoy one evening in the soa and after that evening it will not heat. We looked at the error message (E90), followed the troubleshooting instructions, and still get the error. So guess the unit is bad. Very disappointing. Will be contacting the manufacturer to see what can be done. I gues the old adage is true, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fluke or issue
customer_reviews.text: I tried setting my spa up for the first time last weekend. I filled the water straight from the hot water tank in order to give it a nice head start (started somewhere around 59degrees). I ran the heater through the night and when I awoke, the lines to the heater were frozed solid. --FAIL. I had to drain the entire tub, disconnect the heater and bring it inside to thaw. I will try again next weekend. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: mark loncar

customer_reviews.title: I had one before I bought this one and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one before I bought this one and the base broke. I ordered this one and it was a little smaller. The base fit my old one though, so now I will probably use this one as a mini pool in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get it to turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the base wouldn’t turn on. It tripped every time I plugged it in. Called the company and they send me a second base that did the same thing. I tried it in multiple outlets, and even drove it to a friend’s house thinking perhaps something was wrong with the wiring in my home, but the base which controls the filter etc never worked. So ultimately was never able to use it, which is unfortunate. The color and quality of the tub actually looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Better the Promised !@
customer_reviews.text: To say the set up is easy is an understatement .. Super easy and fast.. From box to Bubble with in an hour ! Still heating up and I will revisit the review in 30 days but as of now . Its everything as promised only Better !!
customer_reviews.author: ODBPete

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing and so does the wife, just get it. BTW super easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing spa at a bargain price !
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about this because a friend had an empty one leaning against her house because she didn't like it. Even my wife was skeptical but after soaking in it a few times we both decided it was a great buy compared to fixed fiberglass units. It's really nice to soak in on summer nights and the bubbles combined with hot water are very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting a jaquizzi for years, but we rent and do not want to lug one around house to house. This one is perfect. Was very easy to set up, it did take a few days to heat up but it wasn’t a big deal. The first month it was plugged in our electric bill doubled, probably from the initial heat up over a few days. Our bills after that have gone back down to normal. The jaquizzi is comfortable and can hold two normal sized adults perfectly. Would recommend this item to friends.
customer_reviews.author: bameye

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: The bladder (the blow up part of the cover) has a leak some where, and the filters do need changed very often. I have to place a rock to hold down the inside drain cover to drain the hot tub and then disassemble to completely empty and try and deep clean after the filters get too dirty and shock doesn't work. Other wise great heat and perfect pressure with the bubbles. Wish it did come with the first set of chemicals tho.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal b.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This tub works as advertised, walls are very sturdy and easy to set up. Initially the idea of sitting on the floor was not appealing to my wife but the Intex Removable Slip-Resistant Seats solved that issue. We use this in a sunroom in Florida so I can not comment on how this would do in a cold environment. Air bubbles are quite aggressive, as expected pumping relatively large quantities of air through the water will have a cooling effect. Overall we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Best value! Great option for a hot tub!
customer_reviews.text: We have always had the old fashioned cumbersome hot tub. My husband's health makes it hard for him to go outside in the winter to use a hot tub. We put this hot tub in our family room in our basement. So easy to install! You cann sit on the sides! The cover removes easily! Great to be able to use a hot tub indoors. Then in the summer we plan to put it out on our deck. Our teenage sons love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Product as described, For the first 3 months, the the spa quit working, a code came on and i have done everything that was told for me to do. Now Amazon told me to contact VM Express , they told me to contact Intex they will not answer the phone , now tell me what to do with a spa that does not work. I need help from amazon, VM Express or Intex, hello anyone out there ???
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sutton

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He LOVES IT!! He drives me NUTS wanting to go in it all the time. It seems the filters need to be cleaned often, which will effect the heating process. Other than that, we’ve had pretty good luck. Real happy with it. He was able to set the whole thing up in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We are almost 2 months in, and we love it. It does heat up slow, only 1-2 degrees per hour. So it takes a full 24 hrs to heat up. One tip, definitely change the filters out frequently, or risk blowing out the pump or heater unit due to stagnant water inside. We've had the E90 error code twice so far due to filters not flowing properly, so buy lots of filters.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after two days..so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We were so exicted when the hot tub arrived a few days earlier than estimated. We set it up as soon as it arrived and filled it with air and water. Heater and bubbles were great. By day three it was clear that the hot tub was not holding air at all..and we've needed to pump it twice a day to just keep it standing up. Very disappointed as the reviews were good, the price was perfect and it was easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Make Sure You Want This Before You Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and discovered that it could not remain outside under a certain temperature, which was not disclosed. I did not want to have to keep setting this up and taking it down. I returned it but the return shipping fees were astronomical and completely out of proportion to the item. Despite my wanting to return this because of the undisclosed temperature issue, the seller would not budge on its fees. I WOULD NOT recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Adler

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a great hot tub
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and fill. Directions straight forward. Heats to 104 degrees and has tremendous jet power. Intex products are great and we look forward to enjoying this hot tub for years to come. Though 2-4 person, it really is meant for 2 adults.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Williams

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these hot tubs we have bought through Amazon. Each one has lasted exactly 13 months and then stopped filtering. We have had NO response from the distributor or the manufacturer. I would recommend buying this spa if you only plan to use it for one year! It is a prime example of something that is less expensive but definitely not worth the price. BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: docmargo

customer_reviews.title: It's a very sturdy hot tub.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is that it won't stay at 104 degrees, it likes 103 degrees. Other wise it is a great little tub! 120 bubble jets really relax the muscles and help with stress and pain.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki R. Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't be more than $250.00 because it's basically disposable
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these before. Should of known better but I think it's still better than some other brands of this style. Had error codes within the first month. At least my last one lasted 6 months before becoming useless
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: That we were using it every weekend but not for too long.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t heat anymore so I’m not using it at all. Would I buy another one ? I don’t think so! This motor only lasted about three months.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Lopez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE INTEX PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy anything from Intex. They have issues that they refuse to stand behind. I have bought two of these pure spa tubs with both failing in less than six months (error E-90). They sell a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive hot tub.
customer_reviews.text: Great, inexpensive hot tub. The item came quickly and was as described. The bubbles are generated by the pump pulling in air from the room the tub is in so it cools down the water quickly. We hardly turn on the bubbles for that reason but still really enjoy the hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Egan

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: 400$ piece of junk. I've had it for 3 months set up in a garage and already getting error codes.
customer_reviews.author: Zap

customer_reviews.title: Worst Customer Service Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in Nov 2019. Worked great up until March - error codes, air leaking, black rubber pieces are wearing away somewhere and now floating throughout the water. I have been trying to contact Intex since MARCH!! It is now almost August! I have left multiple messages and online inquiries regarding my issue. Do not buy if you think you will need their customer service!! It is supposed to have a 1 year warranty, I'm just hoping i can get through to the company before November!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Bad pump
customer_reviews.text: It has an ongoing issue from factory that they wont fix, it's got faulty parts in pump. A couple weeks (a few uses) and now I got an error code and I'm gonna need to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Archie Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Would work perfectly for us, if it does not deflate. Return is half the price pretty much
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for the hot tub. Easy to assemble, and works perfectly. Expect it is getting deflated all the time. So if you are not home for more than 8 hours, you will start spilling the water. And most important, support is not helpful. Tried to find the air leaks, checked everything several times. Seems like material itself does not hold the air. And, on top of that I just paid $270 to return it. The seller does not pay for return.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Gladkikh

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little investment for our rental home. Less trips to the gym at $15 each to work out sour muscles or congestion and we can take it with us when we move. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing in my life. My quality of life has tripled since I got this thing and put it up a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our spa!
customer_reviews.text: We have very much enjoyed our spa. It was super easy to set up, easy to clean and keep clean. Worth it for the low price. We’ve had it for several months and haven’t had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you bet
customer_reviews.text: Have been using now for over 6 months, has worked perfect. During winter, Yes-the power bill goes up- it gets in the low 30's here, and It does lose a degree or so after about 25 minutes, Pump is noisy compared to a 5000 dollar unit, ( but no big deal) .if you run the bubbles--which work awesome.. For a super hot soak, cant be beat.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy this hot tub!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money we’ve ever spent! It is super easy to set up and maintain. We use it every day!! I highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fleece

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This little spa is great! We have a small deck so it fits just perfect. Keeps the water nice and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love our hot tub
customer_reviews.text: we love our hot tub, easy to install and we have gotten alot of use out of it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: donna mcgregor

customer_reviews.title: great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: worth every penny and one of my all time best purchases
customer_reviews.author: mark gardner

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Ez set up. Filled it up. Heater slow at reaching 102 degrees if bubble jets are on, but perfect for 2 ppl. Used a sump pump to drain and clean. Was EZ.
customer_reviews.author: Beu James

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it it's fun just needs to have things to clean it with to be sent with it
customer_reviews.author: Falan Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be nicer
customer_reviews.text: It is nice, would like softer seat and warmer water
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I could’ve ever purchased for my parents to relax at home with. The first one we got was slightly defected which caused it to leak air but every single time I emailed this company they got back to me within MINUTES. I had a replacement at my door within two days. Very happy with the service and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money! Doesn't hold air!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap! Flooded my garage over night, when it went flat!! Never got to even use it! Now the company wants us to pay return shipping for the spa that won't hold air, and cant get it back into its original box!
customer_reviews.author: M A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hot tub for the price! Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and value for the money. Easy to set up and maintain. We had a manufacture defect and they made it very easy to get a replacement. Reputable company and hot tub works as it should. As others have said it isn't a 4 person tub you would have to be really close close friends 😜 To get 4 adults in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hot tub!!
customer_reviews.text: This a great hot tub. I have had no issues with it. I have had it 2 years and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: We use ours almost every night for the last 3 months! So relaxing and the jets are fantastic! Best thing we have spent money on in a long time! Set up is easy but instead of trying to read the directions we used a how to video on youtube. Took like 30 min!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome love it best advise is change the filters regularly and you will be good!
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great just change the filters and keep clean no problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome it sets its self up just maintain it and you’ll have a lot of relaxation in it
customer_reviews.author: william defino

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had ours for about 8 weeks now and love it!! Assembly was super quick and easy and it is holding up fabulously.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed by how quickly this warmed up well water from 55 degrees to 102. I did put a piece of carpet with padding under it for additional comfort but after a month I have only 1 complaint. I don’t get to use it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fill cover with max Amount  of air. Heavy rain will get in if not.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Takes care of my muscle issues! Easy setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Spa warmed up to 102 eventually but as soon as you take the lid off it drops down super fast. Within 10 minutes it was down to 98. Completely worthless and the company will not do anything about taking the return.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Droge

customer_reviews.title: For the money it is great
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida it's nice that it does not have to be heated all the time during summer
customer_reviews.author: Randy Knott

customer_reviews.title: Nice for summer
customer_reviews.text: Works great, finally got to use this summer.. At night if it's not summer it wouldn't work because it won't get hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Dolci

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I can sit on the sides! It’s not 4 adults! If you want 4 adults get the 6 person for sure!!!!! My husband and I use it every night to decompress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to relax
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I've made in a long time. The setup was simple and it is providing hours of relaxation after a long day at work.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: East to put up, study, comfortable. We're having a good time in it.
customer_reviews.author: karen cabral

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good investment. Really enjoy all of the bubbles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's easy to put together. It functions well but I have to inflate it daily. I have determined that it's because the temperature outside is cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E Tallon

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This soft tub has been running none stop for 1 year, and i would is my best purchase for 2019. Thank you amazon and intex.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not Hot
customer_reviews.text: It was ok at first. Hard to keep warm in winter. Keeps shut off for no reason. Slow to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Maples

customer_reviews.title: No water in the tub but it’s beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the tub it’s beautiful! It’s set up and ready as soon as I use it I will tell you more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great after a hard day
customer_reviews.text: Walmart it lasted 3 years outside in the weather so this is my second one of exactly the same model love it
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it excellent choice that I did to buy this portable jacuzzi..
customer_reviews.author: Andres Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Don't over flow the water
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfortable OF the spa It's easy put together, and sturdy feel
customer_reviews.author: MAURICE LOVE

customer_reviews.title: It is a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I use this guy regularly, It is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C. Safford

customer_reviews.title: Love this spa
customer_reviews.text: This spa is awesome. I used it all winter long holding 104 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hot tub just for fun and it is fun. Directions were fairly good. Tub walls inflated, filled with water, turned on heater and next day it was ready to go. Jets worked well and it was definitely fun. Would recommend for anyone not interested in spending big dollars for hot tub to only use once in a while. We love ours.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in a LONG time!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best purchase I’ve made in a LONG time! I love this tub sooooo much. Much more comfy than I thought it would be! The bubble jets are strong and this thing is sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissieent

product_meta.title: Intex PureSpa Bubble Massage 4 Person Capacity Puncture Resistant Inflatable Outdoor Hot Tub Spa with Soothing Jets
product_meta.description: Color:BrownGet cozy, relax, and indulge yourself in the Intex PureSpa Bubble Therapy Inflatable Spa. With the touch of a button, activate the 120-high-powered, soothing bubble jets that surround the interior of the spa and adjust the temperature to best suit your comfort level. It is comfortable enough for 4 people and the durable Fiber-Tech Construction, including 48 Fiber-Tech beams, are strong enough to support someone sitting on the side. This portable hot tub holds 210-gallons of water, has a temperature range of 68 to 104 degrees and requires only simple maintenance with 2 easy-to-replace filter cartridges for clean refreshing spa water. The built-in hard water treatment system makes water gentler on the skin for an even more soothing experience. Treat yourself to a bubbly massage or just relax after a long day in this Intex PureSpa Bubble Therapy Inflatable Spa.
feature_bullets: 120 HIGH-POWERED JETS: Pampering yourself is easy with the soothing high-powered jets and temperature range of 68 to 104 degrees
GENTLE ON SKIN: Built-in hard water treatment system makes water gentler on skin, clothes and the entire spa system
QUICK AND EASY SETUP: Ready for water in about 20-minutes and can be deflated for easy storage or transport
4 PERSON CAPACITY: Provides relaxation at the touch of a button for up to 4 people

PACKAGE INCLUDES: PureSpa tub unit, insulated cover, heating system, 3-way water test strips, 10-watt hard water system, filtration system with 2 filter cartridges, chlorine dispenser, thermal ground cloth, inflation hose, cover straps, and carry bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars185 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
